Service Details: - Delivers a well-wishing email to a patient in many of our hospitals- Send an E-wish that includes the patient's full name, unit, and room number, along with your message, and it will be hand-delivered by a volunteer- Please note that this service is for personal text-only messages and any images, inappropriate content, or business matters will not be delivered- Patients are unable to respond using this service
Address & Map: 2268 Pandosy StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1T2View MapQuest Map
